response.original_title: NK Profeta - Soldado de Paz (Vídeo Oficial)
response.overview: In the difficult and crucial moment that Venezuela is going through, a new musical theme raises its voice against the dictatorial regime of Nicolás Maduro. Leonardo Viloria, better known as NK Profeta, is once again in charge. If anyone has the credentials, it is him, since he previously made songs such as “Mr. President”, “Puro Bla Bla” or “Perdónalos” to name a few against the government, motivated by his friend Saúl Torres who is deprived of liberty for the case of Óscar Pérez, NK made harsh statements against the dictatorship, whom he calls miserable, and also asks the people not to wait for help from third parties and to rise up in protest. The theme was accompanied by a great video with film quality, material that Saúl had unused and gave it to the project; An unarmed soldier dodges bullets and grenades, he represents the peaceful spirit of the Venezuelan, who by nature avoids violent confrontation, at the end he warns that we continue wanting peace as long as there is justice
response.title: NK Profeta - Soldado de Paz (Vídeo Oficial)
